-1.-1.content:
🌟 Welcome to LearnwithAI! 🤖 I'm glad you're interested in learning about transformers and large language models.

Transformers and large language models are a hot topic in the field of artificial intelligence. Understanding these concepts will require you to dive into natural language processing, deep learning, and model architecture.

To create a great course plan tailored to your needs, it would be helpful to know more about your background. For example, do you have any experience with coding or tech concepts? This information will help me customize the course plan to suit your level of expertise. Please share as much detail as possible in the text box below.
